title: More Sega Reboot Games Revealed?? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.12.24
description:
This show is sponsored by BetterHelp - go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10% off your first month.

Tim and Greg talk about some rumored Sega reboots, big Last of Us news, and Golden Sun coming to Switch

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:07:25 - Housekeeping
 - DHQ and Max Murphy from the Kinda Funny Membership on KFG YT, please email joey@kindafunny.com so we can get you your Ben Starr voicemail greeting!
 - A new Kinda Funny Xcast is up right now about the state of Xbox exclusives. Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
 - Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Delaney Twinning
       -  The Roper Report   -
00:08:09 - Three More Sega Classics Are Set To Make Their Return - Tom Henderson @ Insider Gaming
00:21:37 - Last of Us Grounded 2 is coming
00:29:27 - The Last of Us Part 2 Composer Is a Playable Character in Remastered's Guitar Mode - Ryan Dinsdale @ IGN
00:32:24 - The first two Golden Sun games arrive on Nintendo Switch Online next week - Jon Porter @ The Verge
00:41:26 - Smite 2 Announced - Jen Rothery @ IGN
00:43:51 - Fortnite playtime on consoles last month topped Call of Duty, EA Sports FC, GTA 5 and Roblox combined - Tom Ivan @ VGC
00:45:48 - Wee News!
00:48:17 - You‘re Wrong
